definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
to wear/to put on/to dress/to bore through/to pierce/to perforate/to penetrate/to pass through/to thread
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly

sentences.english: Love is a matter of how helpless, eye pain also wear in vain.
sentences.chinese: 愛是多麼無奈的一件事，眼穿腸斷也枉然。
